title: Lawsuit could sink FBI headquarters
text: The problem is Maryland is vying with Virginia for the new FBI headquarters. Why would Mr. Frosh want to spit in the face of the people holding the purse strings and making the decision? He obviously knows nothing about marketing or sales and our legislators must not either or they would be telling Mr. Frosh not to join a useless lawsuit and take the chance you will throw the new FBI Headquarters to Springfield, Va.
summary:
The problem is Maryland is vying with Virginia for the new FBI headquarters.
Why would Mr. Frosh want to spit in the face of the people holding the purse strings and making the decision?
He obviously knows nothing about marketing or sales and our legislators must not either or they would be telling Mr. Frosh not to join a useless lawsuit and take the chance you will throw the new FBI Headquarters to Springfield, Va.
